SELECT msib.segment1 AS material_code, msib.description AS material_name, msib.description AS material_desc, msib.ITEM_TYPE AS material_property, msib.last_update_date AS modified_time, msib.WIP_SUPPLY_LOCATOR_ID AS middle_material_id, substr( msib.description, INSTR( msib.description, '/', 1, 1 ) + 1, INSTR( msib.description, '/', 1, 2 ) - INSTR( msib.description, '/', 1, 1 ) - 1 ) AS product_model_code, mde2.element_value AS voltage FROM INV.mtl_system_items_b msib LEFT JOIN APPS.mtl_item_categories_v t ON t.inventory_item_id = msib.inventory_item_id LEFT JOIN APPS.fnd_common_lookups fc ON msib.item_type = fc.lookup_code LEFT JOIN APPS.po_buyers_val_v pbv ON msib.buyer_id = pbv.employee_id LEFT JOIN APPS.mtl_descr_element_values mde2 ON mde2.inventory_item_id = msib.inventory_item_id AND mde2.element_name = '电压频率'
msib.organization_id in (83, 82, 105) AND msib.inventory_item_status_code = 'Active' AND msib.ITEM_TYPE = 'FG' AND t.organization_id in (83, 82, 105) AND fc.lookup_type = 'ITEM_TYPE' AND t.category_set_id = 1 AND msib.description NOT LIKE '%回用%' AND msib.description NOT LIKE '%出口产品%' AND msib.last_update_date >= TO_DATE('2020-01-01' , 'YYYY-MM-DD' )
AND msib.last_update_date >= TO_DATE( #{date} , 'YYYY-MM-DD' )
